name: Adorable Rap Artists Simulator
description:
Adorable Rap Artists Simulator is a game made in two weeks for the Music Game Jam 2018.

Freshly arrived in Magnifi-city, Lil NicyAwesome has to meet his new neighbors in order to be accepted in the city and maybe find opportunities to  RAP  on a stage ! 

However, the town has one particularity : everybody here is known to be wholesome. Will you be as good as them to finally be famous ?

The game mixes some 3rd person RPG sequences like Animal Crossing with Rythm sessions like Parappa the Raper. 

HOW TO PLAY ? 

Use WASD to move and E to interact with the NPCs. Use the Arrows to play the rhythme game.

This game is a really small prototype to test the mechanics made by a designer with almost no coding experience and a character designer.
